CustomField.formula: sf_devops__Project__r.Name & IF( ISBLANK(sf_devops__Pipeline_Stage__c), IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(sf_devops__Event__c, 'Review')), ' - To be deleted', ' - 1. Work Item : Review' ), ' - ' & TEXT(sf_devops__Stage_Id__c) & '. ' & sf_devops__Pipeline_Stage__r.Name )
CustomField.label: Pipeline Stage
